product_name: Novara Trenta eVent Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Tricked out with ride-ready features to keep you comfortable on the saddle in nasty weather, our Novara Trenta eVent bike jacket blocks wind and water thanks to highly breathable eVent(R) fabric. Durable ripstop nylon shell features an eVent membrane and a nylon lining for waterproof, breathable and comfortable protection. eVent fabric has a unique membrane structure that allows sweat vapor to escape to the outside of the fabric to keep you dry and reduce chilling. Underarm zips wrap front to back and enhance ventilation when you're working up a sweat. Fully taped seams prevent water from penetrating through seams. Large rear pocket stores accessories and features a small interior pocket with cord port to work with a media player. Adjustable cuffs feature rip-and-stick tabs to keep wind and rain out, and droptail hemline ensures coverage while in the riding position. Elasticized drawcord; tricot-lined chin guard and inner collar. Reflective highlights throughout jacket improve visibility in low light. Our Novara Trenta eVent bike jacket features an active fit for a full range of motion.
